org.greencheek.utils.environment.propertyplaceholder.resolver.value
Class VariablePlaceholderValueResolverConfig

java.lang.Object
  org.greencheek.utils.environment.propertyplaceholder.resolver.value.VariablePlaceholderValueResolverConfig
All Implemented Interfaces:
ValueResolverConfig
public class VariablePlaceholderValueResolverConfig
extends Object
implements ValueResolverConfig

Value object that simplifies the creation of the VariablePlaceholderValueResolver object. This class is not thread safe meaning it should be created on the same thread as when the @{link VariablePlaceholderValueResolver} is created for which this class is needed to construct the resolver User: dominictootell Date: 09/06/2012 Time: 16:28
